entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient should consider adding a CloseIdleConnections() method #62256
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'lclVarType != TYP_UNDEF' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #62251
  • Assertion failed 'endOffset > startOffset' during 'Emit GC+EH tables' #62250
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsSIMD(arg) || (info->GetStackSlotsNumber() == 1)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' (IL size 105) #62249
  • Possible typo: "This method is intended for compiler user..." #62248
  • TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime(TimeZoneOffset, TimeZoneInfo) for "Africa/Gaborone" shifts offset from UTC+2:00 to UTC+2:10 #62247
  • ICorDebugILFrame.GetArgument causes EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGSEGV) when used for Math.Round() #62243
    7.0.0
  • Snap engineering debt #62241
  • microsoft.extensions.logging.generators.roslyn3.11.tests work item #62238
  • StackOverflowException when using Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #62239
    7.0.0
  • TypeBuilder creates a type derived from the wrong base type in presence of multiple ALCs #62234
  • Missing entries in user.config after decryption/encryption with ConfigurationSaveMode.Full #62233
  • The command "emcc --version" exited with code 1 #62237
  • Exception not thrown for ZipFile inside Blazor-Server Service #62231
  • Comparing method infos from expressions #62230
  • HttpClient should report protocol error code when the server closes the connection #62228
  • Blazor WASM app with Timers / Async code and ClientWebSocket results in increasing CPU utilisation. #62227
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.ManualTypeMarshallingAnalyzerTests.NativeTypeWithGetPinnableReferenceNoValueProperty_ReportsDiagnostic #62223
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Add NetCoreAppCurrent configurations to every library that targets .NETStandard or .NETCoreApp #54012
    7.0.0
  • ZipArchive.GetEntry() doesn't work properly after adding 2 entries with the same path, and removing one of them #51051
    7.0.0
  • AddEnvironmentVariables(prefix) - prefix is not respected by generic host #61653
    Future
  • Using EmbeddedFileProvider throws "Operation is not supported on this platform" #61724
  • Int32Converter tolerates outrageous syntax 0X+FFFFFFFF #61039
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration Binder attempts to bind to Readonly Static Property #61932
  • Add an argument to SuperPMI #62188
    7.0.0
  • Testing issue triage automation -- please disregard #62246
  • Testing issue triage automation -- please disregard #62211
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\debugging\\debuginfo\\tester\\tester.cmd #62118
  • ClientWebSocket Performance issues on Linux #59314
    Future
  • System.Console.OpenStandardInput() doesn't return a sane Stream. #61865
    7.0.0
  • Number of jit tests failing with `needLabel` assert #61939
    7.0.0
  • Is 'sb.AppendFormat($"{Signature.ParameterTypes[i]}");' a typo error #62137
  • Struct cycled reference via generic runtime exception #62221
  • JIT: Optimize *x = dblCns to *x = intCns for arm64 #61620
    Future
  • Test failure System.IO.FileSystem.Tests.DriveInfoWindowsTests.TestGetDrives #62119
  • SetOut.SetOutReadToEnd (System.Console.Tests) failing #57935
    7.0.0
  • Different Heap behavior between 5.0 and 6.0. Maybe memory leak? #62182
    7.0.0
  • Creating a PKCS7 signature from the result of RSACng.SignHash(..) with dotnet tools #61360
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ETW events for creation of VSD stubs #62255
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] more emscripten asserts for debug build of runtime #62254
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Revert PR #60054: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 #62253
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use ReadOnlySpan<char> on RegexCompiled engine. #62245
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono] Fix warnings with recent clang/gcc #62244
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add test that ensures that it's possible to zip a named pipe on Unix #62240
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] fix issue where HTTP2 connection could be scavenged but not disposed #62236
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0-maui] Exclude the managed code around libproc on iOS/tvOS #62235
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Follow up to universal System.Linq.Expressions #62229
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • JIT: don't forward sub a volatile read tree via copy #62224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use ReadOnlySpan<char> instead of strings on SourceGenerator engine #62222
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Add NetCoreAppCurrent configurations to Microsoft.Extensions libraries #61867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][llvm] Mark the gc poll function as used so llvm doesn't optimi… #62198
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • throw exception when creating an entry name that already exists in ZipArchive #60973
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [SuperPMI] Added a new optional -compile argument #62217
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Couple of debug info test fixes #62199
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix trees generated for vtable calls #62177
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT/EE interface cleanups #62214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Force new label after IG that ends with align instruction #62025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix use of StringBuilder.AppendFormat in ILCompiler #62147
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • fix issue where HTTP2 connection could be scavenged but not disposed #62225
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Type memory maps with placeholders #61933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some missing debug info #62018
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Console.Unix: fix OpenStandardInput Stream sometimes throwing for Reads. #62153
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • don't run the System.IO.FileSystem.DriveInfo tests in parallel #62134
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • re-enable and fix the SetOutReadToEnd test #62200
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Start building a universal System.Linq.Expressions library #61952
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Have RegexInterpreter work over ReadOnlySpan<char> instead of strings. #62165
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Track a missing place to reset alignment flag from BasicBlock #62163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Shrink version name due to NuGet maximum #62190
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, packaging
  • Improve SuperPMI temp filename creation #62169
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Update previous netcoreapp version to run API Compat against 6.0 ref pack #61437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix x86 stackwalk for UnmanagedCallersOnly #61075
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.DirectoryServices #61975
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Add RateLimiting APIs #61788
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #61187
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add Runtime portion of android startup scenario #61861
  • Clean up symlink tests #62087
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Enable memory-mapped stress log on cross platform #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix StackTrace from a dim and Vtable offsets for static interface method #60770
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Ensure all types are loaded when methods are accessed as function pointers #62158
    * NO MERGE *, area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix calling NLS with Cultures has alternative sort names #62155
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • Change Brotli Optimal CompressionLevel value #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Add additional binary operations into the RangeCheck analysis. #61662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix time-of-use vs. time-of-check "bugs" #60860
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support unloadability in `DispatchProxy`. #62095
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add zlib-ng library, optimized for ARM64 #61883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix perf issues discovered in "For software performance, can you always trust inlining" blog #61408
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use interpolated strings in place of `StringBuilder.AppendFormat` where possible. #62160
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62193
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62191
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix mono debugger thread block when wait for attach #62175
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [arm64] JIT: Add with sign/zero extend #61549
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix range checks for "i >= 0 && i < cns" patterns #61569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Make some icalls return objects using an extra ObjectHandleOnS… #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop marking volatile indirections as `NO_CSE` #62043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete the quirks #61876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_SIMD_CHK` and `GT_HW_INTRINSIC_CHK` #62088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.2 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Port #58410: Fix zero initialization use of "initReg" #62207
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Need an option to check for the updates of installed tools similar to that of installed templates update check #22853
  • I can't create a project with dotnet cli #22846
  • NuGet.Config file location #22845
  • building the branch "release/6.0.2xx" of the installer failed on amd64-linux-debian10 #22844
  • ⚡ Add --version and --version-prefix to dotnet build and dotnet pack, please #22840

Closed

  • Globally installed 7.0-alpha breaks restore for 6.0 projects #22752
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 6.0.1xx into the 6.0.2xx branch to catch it up to current #22861
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22857
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Use Environment.Process{Path,Id} & delete wrappers #22759
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Merged missed Version.Details.xml source-build changes from release/6.0.1xx #22833
    Area-Infrastructure, source-build
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22825
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded TFM to the current framework #22805
    Area-FSharp
  • Update Test project x64SolutionBuild to current framework #22532
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Test project XunitMulti to current framework #22770
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update Test project WindowsRuntimeComponent to current framework #22661
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Test project TestAppEchoDotnetRoot to current framework #22784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Blazor AoT Publish Integration Tests #22682
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Exclude runtimeidentifiers for runtimepack #22658
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SyntaxTrivia needs a FunFacts property #58065
  • Overly conservative nullable analysis for finally blocks #58057
  • CS0150 can provide misleading error message when implicit casts are used #58056

Closed

  • c# Intellisense insert a new row pressing enter while it is disabled #57858
    17.1
  • C# 10 File Namespace usage autoformat #57841
    17.1
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis v4.0.1 Causes Dependency Issues #57708
    17.1
  • dotnet format erases trailing comments when migrating to file scoped namespace #57735
    17.1.P2
  • Allow AnalyzeDataFlow for ConstructorInitializerSyntax #57577
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjust doc comment for `SyntaxFactory.ParseTokens` API #58064

  • Standardize list pattern lowering on `Index` constructor. #58055
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Reference new debugger bits #58051
    Area-IDE
  • Fix VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker to handle frames without text b… #58049
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P2
  • Update new UI after design meeting #58047
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required

Merged

  • Exclude unnecessary sqlite assemblies for .Net 6 host #57977
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58048
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add VS integration test pipeline #57953
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Pass AnalysisKind instead of int #58017
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Read SourceLink info and call service to retrieve source from there #57978
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Cherry Pick (#57598) #58050
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add feature to convert to file-scoped namespace just by typing `;` after a normal namespace. #58003
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Next
  • Port "Fix race condition in computing _hostAnalyzerStateMap" for 16.11 servicing #58034
    Area-Analyzers, Approved to merge
  • Snap 17.1 P2 #58041
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58054
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58052
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58053
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Shorten paths in VS installation #57726
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58044
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update to DiffPlex 1.5.0 #58016
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Log runtime framework of remote host #58038
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [17.1 P2 snap] Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58045
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs UX Triage
  • [17.1 P2 snap] Merge main to release/dev17.1 #58046
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs UX Triage

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58067
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58066
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix placement of trivia inside an interpolation #57989

  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Factor nullability logic for placeholders #58036

    Area-Compilers

  • Extract Method: top level method that is static should create a static extraction #58021
    Area-IDE
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [SourceLink] Create output window for logging, and tell the user what is going on #57996
    Area-IDE
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix await completion for expression body lambda #58042
    Area-IDE
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Do less work during CI checkout #57960

  • Update packages version #55655
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider updating DataAnnotationsMetadataProvider to use NullabilityInfoContext #38774
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #38773
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #38772
  • Negotiate auth handler LDAP integration goes in infinate loop when AD groups have circular relationship on Linux #38769
  • Consider using the server culture in Blazor WebAssembly Hosted application #38767
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Modify startup assemblies using the minimal hosting model #38765
  • [WebAssembly hosted in .net core] Make scoped service session dependant #38764
    Discussions
  • Nullable issue with RazorPage model #38762
  • The generated TypeInference class does not have access to _Imports.razor usings #38768
  • Blazor component state is not preserved when handling errors #38757
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Custom Claim is null after successfully login with in max15 minutes #38749
  • ValidateAntiForgeryToken #38748
  • Process Handler Load Failure #38746
  • When behind TLS-terminating reverse proxy, static file middleware redirects from HTTPS to HTTP to append trailing slash #38744
  • Release built docker image with unicode encoder issue #38743
  • InputBase doesn't implement Disposable pattern correctly #38742
  • Remove redundant signing infra #38739
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Controller-based SignIn Problem #38646
    Discussions
  • The type or namespace name 'CreateBuilder' does not exist in the namespace 'WebApplication' #38727
  • AddAzureWebAppDiagnostics throws an exception if used in combination with azure webapp zip deploy #32964
    Test failures
  • ASP.NET Core developer certificate is in an invalid state - .NET 5 RC2 SDK - macOS - .NET Core 3.1 app #26458
  • Implement `/.well-known/change-password` #38766
  • .NET 6 - Cascading Value & StateHasChanged #38734
  • High Number of LoopBack Connection #37738
  • Loading appsettings.json many json "data" entries is very slow in Blazor WASM #38770
  • Blazor Scaffolding Logout page has incorrect route #38367
    7.0-preview1
  • Safari - Unhandled Promise Rejection - NotifyChange #38657
    Discussions
  • InputCheckbox generates "IndexOutOfRangeException" exceptions when bound to an array element in a for loop #38750
  • hot reload does not work with razor page project (that uses net5.0 style API) #38717
  • The issue 38654 has not been resolved #38759
  • [Feature Request] Replace all browsers on windows with only one browser that can run compiled websites. #38745
  • NativeFileReference Error #38752
  • Antiforgery #38747
  • Disable forceful re-render after a button click in Blazor #38728
  • JsonSerializerOptions constructor is not copying the context #38701

PullRequests

Created

  • Double source-build timeout #38775
    area-infrastructure
  • IHtmlHelper doc: what goes into SelectListItem #38760
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `be7a372` to `e2c62a7` #38755
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4848324` to `bb92160` #38754
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4848324` to `bb92160` #38753
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • Update Selenium versions #38740
    area-infrastructure
  • HTTP/3: QPACK decoding microbenchmarks #38738
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4848324` to `bb92160` #38756
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.1
  • Fix logout route casing #38725
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove razor-compiler from aspnetcore #38706
    area-razor.compiler, 7.0-preview1
  • Do not compare IPAddress by reference #38761
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine IHttpActivityFeatureIsAssignedToIfItExists #38737
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • <see cref="DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware"/> #38659
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Linux: Fix nested group resolution for RBAC claims #35279
    area-security, community-contribution
  • IHtmlHelper doc: DisplayTemplates really are under Pages #38735
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve building ASP.NET Core directly on arm64 machines #38527
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • spurious Carriage-Return (Control M) in linux output #2728
    Future
  • `dotnet-gcdump` System.ApplicationException: ETL file shows the start of a heap dump but not its completion. #2766
    .NET 7.0
  • `dotnet-dump` System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Specified argument was out of the range of valid values. #2767
    .NET 6.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • initial pull request for dotnet-trace report (topN feature) #2705
    dotnet-trace

Updated

  • Use PEFile instead of clrmd's PEImage #2769
  • Move command service impl to M.D.DS.Implementation #2772
  • Add support for writing the Brendan Gregg's flamegraph format #2768
  • dotnet-trace collect --show-child-io displays child process' IO only #2774
    dotnet-trace

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DisconnectHandler is never called #3604

Closed

  • Device.InvokeOnMainThreadAsync() throws when called from background thread #3597

PullRequests

Created

  • [WinUI] Get the Window for Initialize WindowOverlay #3608

Merged

  • Don't fire platform navigation requests if no handler is present #3610
  • Call Application.SendStart from the First Windows Create #3607
  • Check for Element instead of VE on FindDispatcher #3599
    area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3601
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.200-preview.11

Updated

  • Button Padding #3575
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • FlyoutView Handler Android #3513
    area/shell 🐢, area/FlyoutPage
  • Added dependency resolution with DataTemplate and Shell global routes… #3375
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing EF Core on a .Net Core 3.1 Project? #26872
  • Package Manager Console Error with Multiple Startup Projects #26871
  • How to make a database able to use migrations, in code, after it was created using EnsureCreate #26870
  • Migrations Bundle : Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'connectionString') #26869
  • Progress on #24889: EF read operation kills app consistently after 535 accesses.... #26868
  • Add EntityFrameworkQueryableExtensions.ToLookupAsync #26867
  • ComplexTypes and Constructors to work with NullReferenceTypes #26866
  • How is the file <project folder>\obj\<project>.csproj.EntityFrameworkCore.targets generated? #26865
  • Cosmos : Need an option to inject/reuse external `CosmosClient` during the setup of EF Core Azure Cosmos DB Provider #26863
  • [.NET 6] Migrate API - Could not find method 'AddYears' on type 'System.DateOnly' #26860
  • Getting started with NRT exposes confusing behaviour. #26859
  • Query: improve TableExpressionBase extensibility by adding annotations #26858
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Change EF Core merge behaviour #26668
  • Where_TimeOnly_subtract_TimeOnly using TimeOnlyTypeMapping for TimeSpan constant #26864
  • How to Use Navigation Property generate left join sql not inner join sql #26833

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #26858 - Query: improve TableExpressionBase extensibility by adding annotations #26861
